forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Abundant sunshine. High 23C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Plenty of sunshine. High 72F. ESE winds shifting to WSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early then becoming cloudy with periods of rain late. Low 13C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies this evening will give way to cloudy skies and rain overnight. Low near 55F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain ending early. Remaining cloudy. High 17C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early. A mix of sun and clouds in the afternoon. High 62F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low near 10C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low around 50F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 17C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 62F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers. Low near 10C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 49F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 16C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 61F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 8C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 46F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 62F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 47F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. High 64F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.
